attributes.action: The House supports the Speaker in declining the honour of addressing Parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
I saw this on the BBC and thought you should see it:

Speaker John Bercow criticised over Donald Trump comments - http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-38889941
attributes.background: Donald Trump's disdain of women and his casual sexist attitudes are abhorrent to most civilised people. We should not give him the him the honour of addressing Parliament and make it known to him that these discriminatory attitudes are the cause.
